statements: SELECT * FROM TeamRoster;
SELECT team_name, member_count FROM TeamRoster WHERE team_captain IS NOT NULL;
SELECT team_name FROM TeamRoster WHERE member_count > 10 ORDER BY team_name DESC;
SELECT team_name, team_captain FROM TeamRoster WHERE team_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM TeamRoster ORDER BY team_id ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM TeamRoster WHERE team_id = 1
SELECT team_name, member_count FROM TeamRoster WHERE member_count > 5 ORDER BY team_name ASC
SELECT team_name, team_captain FROM TeamRoster WHERE team_captain IS NOT NULL AND member_count >= 3 ORDER BY team_name DESC
SELECT team_id, team_name, IFNULL(team_captain,'No Captain') AS captain_name FROM TeamRoster WHERE substitution IS NULL
SELECT team_name, member_count, LENGTH(team_name) AS name_length FROM TeamRoster WHERE team_captain LIKE '%John%'
SELECT * FROM teams;
SELECT team_name, team_captain FROM teams WHERE team_id = 1;
SELECT player_name, player_position FROM players WHERE team_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM teams ORDER BY team_name DESC;
SELECT player_name, player_jersey_number FROM players WHERE player_position = 'Forward';
SELECT * FROM teams WHERE team_name='Manchester United';
SELECT team_name, team_captain FROM teams WHERE team_id=1;
SELECT player_name, player_position FROM players WHERE team_id=2 ORDER BY player_position DESC;
SELECT player_name, player_jersey_number FROM players WHERE team_id=3 AND player_jersey_number > 10;
SELECT team_name, team_captain, player_name, player_position FROM teams JOIN players ON teams.team_id = players.team_id WHERE team_name='Chelsea' ORDER BY player_position ASC;
SELECT * FROM team_members;
SELECT member_name, age FROM team_members ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT role_name, responsibilities FROM roles WHERE role_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM team_members WHERE age > 30;
SELECT member_name, role FROM team_members WHERE role = 'Manager';
SELECT * FROM team_members WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY member_name DESC;
SELECT member_name, role FROM team_members JOIN roles ON team_members.member_id = roles.role_id WHERE team_members.age BETWEEN 25 AND 40;
SELECT member_name, role FROM team_members JOIN roles ON team_members.role = roles.role_name WHERE roles.responsibilities LIKE '%management%';
SELECT member_name, age, reason FROM team_members JOIN substitutions ON team_members.member_id = substitutions.member_id WHERE substitutions.substitution_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT role_name FROM roles;
SELECT * FROM team_members WHERE member_id = 1;
SELECT team_name, captain_id FROM teams WHERE team_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM roles;
SELECT member_name, role FROM team_members WHERE role = 'Coach';
SELECT team_name, member_name, substitute_id FROM teams JOIN substitutions ON teams.team_id = substitutions.team_id AND teams.captain_id = substitutions.member_id;
SELECT * FROM team_members WHERE member_id = 1;
SELECT team_name, member_name, role FROM teams JOIN team_members ON teams.captain_id = team_members.member_id;
SELECT team_name, member_name, role FROM teams JOIN team_members ON teams.captain_id = team_members.member_id WHERE team_id = 2;
SELECT member_name FROM team_members WHERE role = 'Captain';
SELECT team_name, member_name AS substitute FROM teams JOIN substitutions ON teams.team_id = substitutions.team_id JOIN team_members ON substitutions.substitute_id = team_members.member_id;
SELECT * FROM Team;
SELECT team_id, team_name FROM Team WHERE team_id = 1;
SELECT member_name, role FROM TeamMember WHERE team_id = 2;
SELECT role_name FROM Role WHERE role_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM Substitution WHERE substitution_date = '2023-01-15';
SELECT * FROM TeamMember JOIN Team ON TeamMember.team_id = Team.team_id
SELECT Team.team_name, TeamMember.member_name FROM Team INNER JOIN TeamMember ON Team.team_id = TeamMember.team_id ORDER BY Team.team_name DESC
SELECT TeamMember.member_name, Role.role_name FROM TeamMember INNER JOIN Role ON TeamMember.role = Role.role_id
SELECT Team.team_name, COUNT(TeamMember.member_id) AS num_members FROM Team LEFT JOIN TeamMember ON Team.team_id = TeamMember.team_id GROUP BY Team.team_name
SELECT Team.team_name, TeamMember.member_name, Role.role_name FROM TeamMember JOIN Team ON Team.team_id = TeamMember.team_id JOIN Role ON TeamMember.role = Role.role_id
